attributes.action: close down the F.A. and establish an organisation that care about the real game.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Owing to yet again another poor performance by the so called England Team, that has resulted in England's failure to reach the European Championship's.  All the pathetic in fighting and mismanagement by the F.A. has caused this lack of drive, passion and commitment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
